title: The New Talon
body:
Is it me or is Talon's rework the best so far? His Q is pretty good now, His W looks badass, His E allows him to PARKOUR over any wall and his ult is easier to use. They also made his passive better than Mercy!

Really Looking forward to this update tbh

{{champion:91}}  for life

replies.body:
I think we all are looking forward to talon.

Its being buttraped by everyone else, that we are dreading.
